name: Hewlett-Packard Software Restore File
summary: Learn about .PAQ files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: NOTE: PAQ files can be opened with an decompression program like WinZip. If prompted for a password, enter "Pandora" to unlock the file.

description: Contains data used for restoring system files or other data pre-installed on a Hewlett-Packard (HP) computer system; saved in a compressed and encrypted archive format; typically found on HP system software installer or recovery disks.
